Hero.title: Nicolas Cloutier
Hero.subtitle: Creating the impossible
Hero.description: I design and build innovative protocols, security algorithms and ways to make our world easier and better with a focus on efficiency and security.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: About Me
About.description: I'm a blockchain architect, a quantum technologies researcher, and protocol designer with expertise in DeFi, AMM design, and cryptographic systems. With a background in mathematics and computer science, I specialize in creating efficient and secure decentralized protocols.

hydra.title: Hydra AMM Protocol
hydra.description: Lead architect of a breakthrough AMM protocol with adaptive liquidity curves

axiomverse.title: Axiomverse Foundation
axiomverse.description: Founder of a FinTech innovation lab focused on No-blockchain decentralized protocols based on quantum principles and axioms.

d4l.title: D4L Platform
d4l.description: A DEX, a social gathering place, a prediction market and token launcher.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.paragraph1: With over 25 years in software development, I've evolved from traditional systems to blockchain architecture.
journey.paragraph2: My focus is on creating efficient, secure, and innovative decentralized systems that solve real-world problems.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: I believe in a future where decentralized systems provide greater financial inclusion, data sovereignty, and economic opportunity for everyone.
vision.motto: Building bridges between mathematical theory and practical applications

items.title: Protocol Design
items.description: Created innovative AMM protocols with 130% capital efficiency

items.title: Security Research
items.description: Published research on quantum-resistant cryptographic methods

items.title: DeFi Innovation
items.description: Pioneered new approaches to decentralized derivatives

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.description: Developed gas-optimized contract systems for major protocols

Expertise.title: Expertise
Expertise.description: I specialize in the following areas of blockchain development and protocol design.

Blog.title: Blog
Blog.subtitle: Thoughts on blockchain technology, protocol design, and the future of decentralized systems.
